subtitle: A Treasure Hunt inside your B&B
theconcept_subtitle: Boost your B&B by adding a Fun Treasure Hunt with a Brussels Theme.
theconcept_puzzle_sub: We add to your place a fun treasure hunt, in an escape game style.
theconcept_app_sub: The game is an web app that can be used with any devices (Smartphone, table, laptop).
theconcept_bxl_sub: To solve the puzzle in the app, you must use the Brussels theme decorations we provide.
theconcept_candy: Récompenser les gagnants avec des sucreries locales
theconcept_candy_sub: Une fois la dernière énigme trouvée, vos hôtes pourront ouvrir le coffre que vous aurez remplis de divers sucreries régionales (par exemple : chocolat, speculoos, cuberdons,...)
theconcept_review_sub: This game help you to get 5 Stars reviews. This will allow you to raise your nightly rate !
